resources.string: The name is <myName>.
<yes><NPCName> got in contact with me and told me to come check out <IslandName>.
<thinking>When she told me about all the tucker you can find here, I had to pack my bags and come take a look.
<glee>I bloody love cooking and eating great food.
<yes>I hope to try all the wonderful food you can cook here on <IslandName>.
Lovely to meet you, <petName>.
<wave>Oh, hello.
My name is <myName>.
<NPCName> told me about you.
He's my big brother.
<NPCName> told me that your name is <PlayerName>.
<no>I asked him if you liked bugs and stuff, but he said he didn’t know.
So anyway, do you like bugs?
<glee>I really, really love bugs.
<NPCName> told me to come visit him here on <IslandName> because there are lots of bugs.
And guess what?
<pumped>He was right!
Ah! Hey there!
I'm <myName>. I moved into the new house here.
You're <PlayerName>, right?
I heard that you're the one thats been working hard to get this town set up?
Well, thanks for that, <PlayerName>! <glee>
I'm <myName>. I moved into the new house here.
You're <PlayerName>, right?
I heard that you're the one thats been working hard to get this town set up?
Here is the Weather Station's forecast:
Ah! Hey there!
I'm <myName>. I moved into the new house here.
You're <PlayerName>, right?
I heard that you're the one thats been working hard to get this town set up?
Well, thanks for that, <PlayerName>! <glee>
G’day <PlayerName>.
Good to see you again!
<shy>Who am I?
<proud>Why, I’m <myName>!
Don’t you remember me?
I used to come and visit you and your family every year back in <SouthCity>!
<haha>Ho Ho Ho!
What am I doing here on <IslandName>?
<yes>You see, it’s getting to be my busiest time of the year.
<glee>So I like to come visit <IslandName> to soak up some rays before things get crazy.
<proud>You could say <IslandName> is my secret holiday destination.
Well, now that you’ve found me I may as well offer some of my services.
I can craft you some interesting items, but I didn’t bring my ingredients you see?
So if you track them down for me, I’d be happy to whip some things up for you.
I’ve been crafting things for years and years, it really makes me happy!
Come talk to me if any time you see me here on <IslandName> and take a look at what I can craft.
So, <PlayerName> . We made it.
Let's find a place we can start building!
Oh, so you placed the <itemName>?
What kind of dog would you like?
A fancy boy!
A good boy!
A little boy!
A loyal boy!
Great. Lets give them a name, okay?
Great. Lets give them a name, okay?
Great. Lets give them a name, okay?
Great. Lets give them a name, okay?
Excellent.
<proud>I will begin right away.
<yes>It will probably take all night, but I assure you, it will be ready by tomorrow.
Now, if you do not mind, I have work to do.
Oh, what did you want to chat about?
I can't learn anything new from this...
<yes><PlayerName>, I see you have been repairing the Tele-Towers around the island.
<thinking>To be honest, I did not think you had the know-how to even understand what they were intended for…
<yes>Regardless, I have come up with an idea to build a <itemName> that we could place wherever we want.
<thinking>Now adding too many would most likely disrupt the Tele-Network.
<yes>So I think we will only be able to build one.
I have spoken to <NPCName> and she has agreed to add it to the available deeds.
<shock>Oh, <PlayerName>!
I wanted to let you know that <IslandName> has been cleared to build 3 additional buildings.
<pumped>These buildings are additional houses!
<thinking>I’ve been told we can use them for whatever purpose we want.
<glee>I’ll let you decide whether the new house is storage, a display home or a place for a friend to stay when they come to visit.
<yes>We’re allowed to have three total here on <IslandName>.
So come and ask me about the deeds when you want to build one!
Great work! We'll have our town bustling in no time.
Here is a deed for a Market Place. This will be a place for visitors to set up their home or shop while they stay here.
It might be a good idea to visit their tents and say hello!
If you give them enough business, and maybe do a couple of odd jobs for them, they might move here permanently!
Once the post office is built, we can have a look at some more deeds to place, okay?
I'm looking forward to seeing more people move here!
Hey <PlayerName> .
Lets start building our town!
We're going to need just the basic to begin with.
Are you ready?
<thinking>You could probably use it to get some infomation on any plants you are growing.
<yes>Oh, don't worry about me, I think you'll, like, get more use out of it to be honest.
<haha>Anyway, I've got all the info up here!
<glee>Anyway, if you could place it down somewhere, that would be great.
<yes>Be sure to check it every so often.
<yes>Anything you find in it is up for grabs, so feel free to take it!
I'm ready!
Not yet.
Okay! I'm going to get you to place some land deeds.
These deeds will show people where they can build their houses or businesses.
Use this Axe to clear the land where you want to place the deed.
Land deeds can only be placed on clear and levelled land.
Come back and talk to me once you have placed the deed.
Not a problem! I'll let you have a look around for now.
Have a look around, and then come back when you're ready.
Just be sure it's before night time! We don't want to be setting up in the dark.
Thank you for taking care of the <requestedHuntTarget>.
Those Alpha creatures are really dangerous and can cause a lot of havoc.
Here, take <BulletinBoardReward> as promised.
Thanks for keeping <IslandName> safe for everyone, <PlayerName>.
<glee>Well done, <PlayerName>.
<yes>You have proven yourself invaluable once again!
<shocked>You're really starting to carry a lot of stuff around!
<yes>I'll tell you what, I'll teach you how to craft a <itemName>.
<yes>You're going to need a recipe for Nails too.
<proud>I'll tell you what, <IslandName> is well on it's way to being a great settlement again!
<yes>With a furnace and a table saw we can start thinking about building more permanent structures.
I'll tell you what, we should try and get <NPCName> to set up a real shop here!
<yes>Come back and talk to me when you are ready.
<thinking>Although, probably can't sell you a lot of tools until you have all your <Licences> in order.
You know about <Licences>, right?
Let's do it!
How do we do that?
That's the spirit, <PlayerName>!
<yes>I reckon if we spend a bit of money at his tent, he'll see it's worth while...
<yes>Oh, and we should show him how friendly people are around here!
Why don't you ask <NPCName> if he has anything he needs done?
<haha>If we can prove to him that <IslandName> is a great place to move, I'm sure he'll ask to live here for good!
You’ll have to spend some <PermitPoints> to get them, but if you keep doing milestones you’ll make enough in no time.
As you get better at doing certain tasks, new <Licence> levels will open up too.
Now, let’s see if there is a <Licence> you can apply for right now...
I’ll let you decide where the best place for this <itemName> is.
<haha>Just be sure it's closeby!
<glee>We want visitors to feel like part of the <IslandName> community while they are here!
Who knows, maybe we can convince him to set up a permanent shop here!
<yes>Be sure to talk to me once you have placed the <itemName>.
<thinking>Hmmmm....
<yes>I reckon if we spend a bit of money at his shop, he'll see it's worth while...
<yes>Oh, and we should show him how friendly people are around here!
Why don't you ask <NPCName> if he has anything he needs done?
<haha>If we can prove to him that <IslandName> is a great place to move, I'm sure he'll ask to live here for good!
You’ll have to spend some <PermitPoints> to get them, but if you keep doing milestones you’ll make enough in no time.
As you get better at doing certain tasks, new <Licence> levels will open up too.
Now, let’s see if there is a <Licence> you can apply for right now...
I’ll let you decide where the best place for this <itemName> is.
<haha>Just be sure it's closeby!
<glee>We want visitors to feel like part of the <IslandName> community while they are here!
Who knows, maybe we can convince him to set up a permanent shop here!
<yes>Be sure to talk to me once you have placed the <itemName>.
Wow. You really found <requestItem>!
You're the best <PlayerName>!
I really owe you one. Here, take this.
Its not much but I hope you like it! Thanks again.
Well done <PlayerName>.
You have acquired 10 <itemName>.
<no>I did not think this was possible.
<yes>I am impressed.
Now, if you would allow me to study the 10 <itemName>.
<thinking>….
<thinking>Hmmm…
<shocked>Yes!
<glee>I believe there is a way to process this into a usable material.
Studying this <itemName> has given me an idea for a new invention.
Please, <PlayerName>, come talk to me if you want me to craft you something new!
Oh, you've got <requestItem> ?
Here you go!
Not yet, sorry.
Great!
Oh, okay then...
You brought me <requestItem> ?
Here you go!
Not yet, sorry.
Thats great. Now I can make <BulletinBoardReward>
Aww . . . you got me excited for <BulletinBoardReward> .
Oh bonza! You crafted a <requestItem> for me?
Here you go.
Nah.
Oh, righto, <PlayerName>...
<PlayerName>.........
<PlayerName>?
<PlayerName>! Can you hear me?
<yes>I’m so glad you’re okay!
It looks like you fainted out there!
<yes>Please be careful out there and always keep an eye on your health and energy.
<no>If the world starts losing colour you know you’ve worked too hard.
<yes>Please make sure you eat something to keep your energy up.
<shy>When you didn’t return after a while, I had to call for a search party from <SouthCity> to come and find you.
<worried>Those guys delivered you here, but it looks like they went through your pockets and took a fair cut of your <Dinks>.
Maybe they thought you wouldn't notice?
<thinking>It looks like some of your tools have taken a bit of damage too…
Please be careful out there, <PlayerName>.
<haha>I’ll tell you what, I’m glad you’re okay, but I don’t really want to have to go through that again!
All passengers, please prepare to leave the Airship.
You got the photo for me?
Sure did!
Not yet.
Great! Can't wait to see it!
No problems. I can't wait to see it
G’day there.
The name’s <myName>.
I’m <NPCName>’s little brother!
<NPCName> said I should come visit <IslandName>.
<no>I wasn’t really up for a vacation.
<haha>As soon as he mentioned the amount of fish you could find here, I was booking a ticket!
A place like this would be perfect for a <FishingComp>.
So I’m hosting one today!
Thanks, <PlayerName>!
Here is <BulletinBoardReward>.
I'll get to work making some more!
Wow! Thank you. Now I can make some <BulletinBoardReward>
Please enjoy this <BulletinBoardReward> .
Thank you so much, <PlayerName> .
<glee>Thanks a lot, <PlayerName>!
<yes>When I put up that post, I knew you would be the one to pull through for me.
Here is your <BulletinBoardReward>!
You've got yourself a deal, <PlayerName>.
Here's my <BulletinBoardReward>.
Thanks for trading!
Wow!
<yes>This is a great photo, <PlayerName>.
<glee>Thank you for taking this for me!
Can I keep it? I will pay <BulletinBoardReward>?
It's all yours!
Actually I want it...
<glee>Thank you very much <PlayerName>!
Here is <BulletinBoardReward>!
<sigh>Well, thanks for letting me take a look anyway...
<glee>Thanks a lot, <PlayerName>!
<yes>You've really saved me, I didn't think I would get that shipment filled.
Here is your <BulletinBoardReward>!
Thank you, <PlayerName>.
Take these <BulletinBoardReward>. I just like smelting them and I don't really need them.
You up for it?
That’s a tool I think will be very handy, indeed!
I think we should try and make enough money to buy a <itemName> from <NPCName>.
Here is my half of the Dinks. The rest is up to you!
Maybe you could go catch some of the bugs around here?
Or maybe you could cook some of that fruit you found?
<glee>For every milestone you surpass, you’ll be rewarded with <PermitPoints>.
<yes>I'll tell you what, you're going to want a lot of <PermitPoints> eventually.
<no>But we can talk more about that tomorrow.
<yes>For now, check out the journal.
<shocked>I think you’ll find that you’ve actually completed some of the milestones inside.
So be sure to claim them. <glee>
<yes>Now, are you hungry? I am.
<haha>I think it's just about lunch time.
<glee>I’ve seen fruit growing around this island and that sounds tasty!
<yes>You go and find us some fruit and when you get back I will show you how to craft a <itemName>.
I'm ready!
Not yet.
Not yet.
If we are going to build anything around here we’re going to need materials.
I reckon we need to wood and Tin.
Now, wood? That’s easy. You chop down a tree and then you’ve got some wood. <yes>
But Tin? That’s a bit trickier. I’ve seen it around the island poking out of rocks here and there. It’s a dark ore. You’ll know it if you see it.<yes>
Now, we’re going to need to smelt it down into bars before we can use the Tin Ore for building things. <thinking>
Go give the island a bit of a looky-loo for <questRequiredItems>.
Bring them back here and I'll show you how we can turn Tin Ore into bars. <glee>
<proud>Once you’ve gathered everything we need, come and see me!
Righto then.
Come see me soon, okay?
If you are tired, pop that on the ground and have a lay down.
<haha>I'll tell you what, a good nights rest will do us both good!
Thanks for your help today, <PlayerName>.
I can't believe we're on <IslandName>!
<glee>I couldn't have done any of this without you!
<yes>Righto.
You've been helping out a lot, so take your time, <PlayerName>.
<glee>Just come back and see me when you're ready.
Ah, <PlayerName>.
Am I correct in assuming that you have discovered the incredibly rare <itemName>.
<thinking>I have seen this ore referenced often in the data I have been extracting from the shiny discs.
<thinking>However, I must admit, I had assumed that it was a myth...
If you could bring me 10 <itemName>, I believe I may have a way to process it into a very useful material.
Please come back and speak to me once you have collected the <itemName>.
I’ve already applied for the <itemName>.
<yes>So, come and speak to me if you think we are ready to build it.
Hey, <PlayerName>.
I've decided I really like it here.
So, I spoke to Fletch, and I've applied for a deed so I can set up a permanent store here in town.
I hope I can move in soon!
There are so many amazing creatures and plants on this island! <pumped>
I think it might be worth documenting them all, correct? <yes>
What if we built a museum here?
Somewhere where we could gather all of the amazing things here for everyone to see? <glee>
I’ll talk to <NPCName> about applying for a <itemName>.
This is so exicting! <glee>
Oh, you don't have <requestItem> at all.
Let me know if you find <requestItem>.
Oh, you don't have the photo? Thats ok!
Hey <PlayerName>. Want a pet dog?
<yes>If you do place this <itemName> somewhere and come and speak to me.
So, this is where you decided to build, huh?
<glee>It’s absolutely perfect! Our new home here on <IslandName>!
Thank you so much for setting up the Base Tent.<yes>
Oh, and guess what? I actually have a <itemName> for you too! <haha>
<shy>I know it's not much but it will be a place you can call home!
Now, there is plenty of room to spread out here on <IslandName>.
So please take your time to place your <itemName>.
<yes>You’ll probably be visiting the Base Tent a fair bit.
<thinking>So keep that in mind while you are looking for a spot to claim as your own.
I’ll be inside the Base Tent getting things ready.
Come and speak to me once you’ve placed your <itemName>.
So, this is where you decided to build, huh?
<glee>It’s absolutely perfect! Our new home here on <IslandName>!
Thank you so much for setting up the Base Tent.<yes>
Oh, and guess what? I actually have a <itemName> for you too! <haha>
<shy>I know it's not much but it will be a place you can call home!
Now, there is plenty of room to spread out here on <IslandName>.
So please take your time to place your <itemName>.
<yes>You’ll probably be visiting the Base Tent a fair bit.
<thinking>So keep that in mind while you are looking for a spot to claim as your own.
I’ll be inside the Base Tent getting things ready.
Come and speak to me once you’ve placed your <itemName>.
Wow!
<glee>Smell that fresh air!
I'll tell you what, it feels good to finally be back on <IslandName>.
Now, <PlayerName>, I’m going to need your help getting settled, okay?
<yes>I’ll give you this <itemName>. Take your time and find a good place for it. It’ll be like our town hub!
Take this map as well. If you have any questions, please just ask me.
<shy>I haven’t been back to <IslandName> for a very long time, but I think I can still be helpful.
<yes>I’ll be waiting by this dock until you set up the <itemName>.
<yes>So if you get lost, just check your map to find the dock again.
Good luck, <PlayerName>!
Ah, <PlayerName>. Hows it going, mate? Do you have any questions?
Tell me about the Island.
Where do you think we should set up camp?
How do I place the tent?
See ya!
<thinking>You see, I was actually born here on <IslandName>.
<no>Back before we moved to <SouthCity>...
<thinking>Hmmm...
Oh, right. Let me tell you what I remember about <IslandName>...
If I remember correctly, up north you'll find a tropical climate.
<thinking>To the south it can get a bit chilly, but I recall my Dad warned me about the wildlife down there…
To the east and west of the island are flat open plains. The ground is nice and flat, so it would be easy to build there.
The coasts are a great place for fishing year-round. So if you like throwing a line, it might be worth setting up the <itemName> near the beach.
<haha>The centre of the island is a desert. It’s hot and dry there, and it’s full of bugs!
<yes>But no matter where you decide we should build, being close to water is always a good idea.
So if you want to set up inland anywhere, try and do it close to a river.
<haha>I feel like that’s a lot to take in. Sorry about that, <PlayerName>!
It’s been a long time since I was here last! I was a little girl back then, so I’ll let you figure out how long ago that was! <shy>
But I do have two places in mind that might be a good place to set up the <itemName>... <thinking>
The eastern and western coasts both have plainlands that I think would make for an easy building area. <yes>
The terrain there is flat and won't take too much effort to build on. Plus the climate should be good for farming most of the year. <yes>
But you don’t have to listen to old <myName>! You’re the one running around out there!
I’m sure that wherever you decide to place the <itemName>, it will be the right place.<yes>
Now if you have any other questions, just ask!
Ah, good question <PlayerName>!
First select the <itemName> in your toolbelt so it’s in your hand.
Once you use the <itemName> you’re going to have to decide where to place it.<yes>
You’re going to need enough space for the <itemName> to be set up. The only other thing to keep in mind is that the ground needs to be flat and even. <yes>
If you have any other questions, please come and ask me <yes>
Good luck, <PlayerName>!
Oh, <PlayerName>!
The towns ecconomy is growing very nicely.
I think it might be a good time for us to think about maybe building a bank.
Please speak to me if you are interested in applying for a bank deed! <yes>
Oh, and thanks for placing the <itemName>. You're a good friend, <PlayerName>. <glee>
Hey <PlayerName>.
I've had an idea for something <IslandName> could really use!
Take this <itemName>.
<proud>I thought people could maybe put things they don't want in here.
<yes>I will clear it out on Thursdays.
<shocked>What am I doing with the stuff?
<shy>I'm going to recycle it...
<glee>Anyway, if you could place it down somewhere, that would be great.
<yes>Be sure to check it every so often.
<yes>Anything you find in it is up for grabs, so feel free to take it!
<yes><PlayerName>, I see you have been repairing the Tele-Towers around the island.
<thinking>To be honest, I did not think you had the know-how to even understand what they were intended for…
<yes>Regardless, I have come up with an idea to build a <itemName> that we could place wherever we want.
<thinking>Now adding too many would most likely disrupt the Tele-Network.
<yes>So I think we will only be able to build one.
I have spoken to <NPCName> and she has agreed to add it to the available deeds.
Oh, <PlayerName>!
<IslandName> is growing very nicely.
With our current population, <SouthCity> has offically recognised <IslandName> as a settlement.
That means we can upgrade the base tent into a real Town Hall.
<proud>I'll tell you what, I'll cover the costs myself.
If I could ask you to gather items required for the Town Hall.
<yes>I've put a Deposit Box out the front of the Base Tent.
<shy>I'll tell you what, you've really changed my life for the better, <PlayerName>.
<yes>Infact, everyone here on <IslandName> owes it all to you!
<yes>It's not much, but we wanted to get you a gift.
<yes>Think of it as a symbol of gratitude from everyone here on <IslandName>.
<PlayerName>, I've been contacted by some of the people back in <SouthCity>.
<no>I've been notified that we will need 5 permanent residents before <IslandName> is recognised as an official settlement.
Now, there is no hurry, but maybe that should be our next goal?
<haha>I'll tell you what, any visitors that see how nice <IslandName> is will want to stay anyway!
Once <SouthCity> recognises <IslandName> as an official settlement, we can build a Town Hall!
<glee>I'm sure we'll reach our goal soon!
Oh, <PlayerName>.
<glee>I, like, have a gift for you.
It's my <itemName>.
<shy>I've been adding information to it, like, my whole life.
<thinking>You could probably use it to get some infomation on any plants you are growing.
<yes>Oh, don't worry about me, I think you'll, like, get more use out of it to be honest.
<haha>Anyway, I've got all the info up here!
<shock>Oh, <PlayerName>!
I wanted to let you know that <IslandName> has been cleared to build 3 additional buildings.
<pumped>These buildings are additional houses!
<thinking>I’ve been told we can use them for whatever purpose we want.
<glee>I’ll let you decide whether the new house is storage, a display home or a place for a friend to stay when they come to visit.
<yes>We’re allowed to have three total here on <IslandName>.
So come and ask me about the deeds when you want to build one!
You found a good place for your tent?
<shy>I know it's not much, but I hope you like your new home!
I'll tell you what, you've got the "spark", <PlayerName>.
<yes>You see, most people back in <SouthCity> are scared of leaving.
<thinking>There is something about that place that pulls the "spark" out of people...
<no>But I'll tell you what, we certainly aren't the first to leave!
Have you ever heard of the traveling trader, <NPCName>?
No I haven't.
Of course I have!
<yes>I'll tell you what, he’s a bloody legend!
Rumour is he traded a paperclip for a steam boat once!
<proud>Trading is in his very blood!
<NPCName> got in contact with me before we left <SouthCity>.
<pumped>He's interested in visiting with his shop here!
<no>I'll tell you what, we can't miss an opportunity like this!
<yes>I reckon we get this <itemName> ready for him.
<yes>That way we'll have a place ready for any visitors who come to <IslandName>.
I’ll let you decide where the best place for this <itemName> is.
<haha>Just be sure it's closeby!
<glee>We want visitors to feel like part of the <IslandName> community while they are here!
Who knows, maybe we can convince him to set up a permanent shop here!
<yes>Be sure to talk to me once you have placed the <itemName>.
<haha>Who hasn't!
<pumped>He's a bloody legend!
<proud>Trading is in his very blood!
<NPCName> got in contact with me before we left <SouthCity>.
<pumped>He's interested in visiting with his shop here!
<no>I'll tell you what, we can't miss an opportunity like this!
<yes>I reckon we get this <itemName> ready for him.
<yes>That way we'll have a place ready for any visitors who come to <IslandName>.
I’ll let you decide where the best place for this <itemName> is.
<haha>Just be sure it's closeby!
<glee>We want visitors to feel like part of the <IslandName> community while they are here!
Who knows, maybe we can convince him to set up a permanent shop here!
<yes>Be sure to talk to me once you have placed the <itemName>.
As you know, we’ve been tasked with starting a new settlement on this island.
I know you’ve just arrived but I’m going to need your help right away!
The first thing we need to do is set up a base camp.
Take this <itemName>. This will be our base of operations as it were. We will be building the settlement out from there.
Please take your time to look around the island before deciding where to start our new settlement.
Once you have found a suitable place, you will need to clear out the land to place the <itemName>.
I’ll give you some tools that I’ve brought with me. These should be enough to clear some space to set up the <itemName>
I will wait here at the dock, but I will meet you at the <itemName> once you’ve got it set up. If you have any further questions please come and see me.
I’m so glad you’ve made it here safe and I’m very excited to be working with you!
Ah, <PlayerName> what do you think of the <itemName>?
I got it all set up fairly quickly, right! <haha>
How’d you go setting up yours?
How do I place the tent?
I haven't set up yet.
It's actually the same way you set up the Base Tent!
First select the <itemName> in your toolbelt so it’s in your hand.
Once you use the <itemName> you’re going to have to decide where to place it.<yes>
You’re going to need enough space for the <itemName> to be set up. The only other thing to keep in mind is that the ground needs to be flat and even. <yes>
Come back and speak to me once you've got your <itemName> all set up.
Come back and speak to me once you've got your <itemName> all set up.
<yes><IslandName> is really starting to grow…
<thinking>I’ll tell you what, it might be a good idea to build a Band Stand.
<haha>No, we’re not having any musical guests any time soon.
<PlayerName>, if <IslandName> had a Band Stand, we could use it as a place to host events.
We could host parties, gatherings, celebrations…
<glee>It would be a place where everyone on <IslandName> could gather and just hang out.
I’ve already applied for the <itemName>.
<yes>So, come and speak to me if you think we are ready to build it.
Well done <PlayerName>.
You have acquired 10 <itemName>.

Ah, <PlayerName>.

<thinking>I have seen this ore referenced often in the data I have been extracting from the shiny discs.

So, we're all set for visitors, huh?
Well done <PlayerName>!
<pumped>We’ve only been here for a little while, but you’ve achieved so much already!
<yes>You remind me of my father. He was born right here on <IslandName>, you know?
<proud>He was a true blue Adventurer through and through.
He loved doing new things and keeping track of all his milestones in his <itemName>.
<sigh>I wanted to come here and try and meet those milestones myself.

<shy>Please, I want you to take his <itemName>.
<yes>Please keep good care of it.
This is your adventure now.
<PlayerName>! I received a letter earlier today from someone named <NPCName>. Unusual name, if you ask me.
Now I’ve heard of this fella. He’s a travelling trader. More than that, he’s a bloody legend.
Rumour is he traded a paperclip for a boat once!
Trading is in his very blood!
Well, he’s heard about all the hard work we’re doing putting this town together, and he reckons he wants to bring his little travelling store right here.
Opportunity is knocking, so let’s answer that door with a smile. Let's clear out some more space somewhere for this <itemName>
That way, there will be a place for anyone visiting our island to stay.
<PlayerName>, take this <itemName> and place it somewhere you think would be a good place visitors can stay.
<PlayerName>! Have you found a place for the <itemName>?

I'm still looking.

Oh, you've found something to eat!
<yes>Eating food will help keep your energy up!

<thinking>To the south it can get a bit chilly, but I recall my Dad warned me about the wildlife down there…
To the east and west of the island are flat open plains. The ground is nice and flat, so it would be easy to build there.
The coasts are a great place for fishing year-round. So if you like throwing a line, it might be worth setting up the <itemName> near the beach.
<haha>The centre of the island is a desert. It’s hot and dry there, and it’s full of bugs!
<yes>But no matter where you decide we should build, being close to water is always a good idea.

Hard yakka requires stamina!
That means, for every task you do, you’ll use up your stamina.
So, it's a good idea to eat before you do tasks.
<proud>That will help keep your stamina up.
<shy>Some foods offer more stamina than others, but you’ll get the hang of that.
<worried>If you run out of stamina, you’re going to get tired.
<yes>You’ll be sluggish and slow until your stamina recovers.
So keep your belly full of stamina foods and you’ll be right.
<yes>It can be dangerous out there on <IslandName>.
<glee>So if you feel your health is low, it's a good idea to keep your belly full of healthy foods.
These foods will slowly restore your health.
<yes>You’ll learn what foods are good for restoring health, I’m sure.
<thinking>If you need to restore health quickly, you can always take a seat and recoup.
<yes>Your health will recover much quicker from food if you are sitting down.
Your belly can only hold so much, <PlayerName>.
So it’s a good idea to choose the foods you want to eat wisely.
Every type of food has its own benefits.
You’re going to want to make sure you get a well balanced diet for any task you want to tackle.
If you're full, but you want to make yourself not full, you can always craft a <itemName> and take a seat.
That will empty your belly allowing you to choose a different meal to eat.
If you’re low on health, and eat healthy food, your health will slowly recover.
However, you can speed up health recovery by taking a seat after eating.
